Text:
I will be seeding as much as possible though i have to teach classes at random point sin every day and return to leave bittorrent sending whenever i am at home and through every night. be patient.
C. Sean McGee

and if anyone else has downloaded, could you seed for a short period. Maybe seed for the size that you download. Give a little, get a little.
Cheers for proving once again that downloaders are considerate and educated
